verses.verse: It is not expedient<WG4851> <WG3756> for me<WG3427> doubtless<WG1211> to glory.<WG2744> I will<WG1063> come<WG2064> to<WG1519> visions<WG3701> and<WG2532> revelations<WG602> of the Lord.<WG2962>

I knew<WG1492> a man<WG444> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> above<WG4253> fourteen<WG1180> years<WG2094> ago, (whether<WG1535> in<WG1722> the body,<WG4983> I cannot tell;<WG1492> <WG3756> or whether<WG1535> out<WG1622> of the<WG3588> body,<WG4983> I cannot tell:<WG1492> <WG3756> God<WG2316> knoweth;)<WG1492> such a one<WG5108> caught up<WG726> to<WG2193> the third<WG5154> heaven.<WG3772>

And <WG2532> I knew<WG1492> such<WG5108> a man,<WG444> (whether<WG1535> in<WG1722> the body,<WG4983> or<WG1535> out<WG1622> of the<WG3588> body,<WG4983> I cannot tell:<WG1492> <WG3756> God<WG2316> knoweth;)<WG1492>

How that<WG3754> he was caught up<WG726> into<WG1519> paradise,<WG3857> and<WG2532> heard<WG191> unspeakable<WG731> words,<WG4487> which<WG3739> it is not lawful<WG1832> <WG3756> for a man<WG444> to utter.<WG2980>
Of <WG5228> such a one<WG5108> will I glory:<WG2744> yet<WG1161> of<WG5228> myself<WG1683> I will not<WG3756> glory,<WG2744> but<WG1508> in<WG1722> mine<WG3450> infirmities.<WG769>

For <WG1063> though<WG1437> I would desire<WG2309> to glory,<WG2744> I shall not<WG3756> be<WG2071> a fool;<WG878> for<WG1063> I will say<WG2046> the truth:<WG225> but<WG1161> now I forbear,<WG5339> lest<WG3361> any man<WG5100> should think<WG3049> of<WG1519> me<WG1691> above<WG5228> that<WG3739> which he seeth<WG991> me<WG3165> to be, or<WG2228> that he heareth<WG191> <WG5100> of<WG1537> me.<WG1700>

And <WG2532> lest<WG3363> I should be exalted above measure<WG5229> through the<WG3588> abundance<WG5236> of the<WG3588> revelations,<WG602> there was given<WG1325> to me<WG3427> a thorn<WG4647> in the<WG3588> flesh,<WG4561> the messenger<WG32> of Satan<WG4566> to<WG2443> buffet<WG2852> me,<WG3165> lest<WG3363> I should be exalted above measure.<WG5229>
For <WG5228> this thing<WG5127> I besought<WG3870> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> thrice,<WG5151> that<WG2443> it might depart<WG868> from<WG575> me.<WG1700>

And <WG2532> he said<WG2046> unto me,<WG3427> My <WG3450> grace<WG5485> is sufficient<WG714> for thee: <WG4671> for<WG1063> my<WG3450> strength<WG1411> is made perfect<WG5048> in<WG1722> weakness. <WG769> Most gladly<WG2236> therefore<WG3767> will I rather<WG3123> glory<WG2744> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> infirmities,<WG769> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> power<WG1411> of Christ<WG5547> may rest<WG1981> upon<WG1909> me.<WG1691>

Therefore <WG1352> I take pleasure<WG2106> in<WG1722> infirmities,<WG769> in<WG1722> reproaches,<WG5196> in<WG1722> necessities,<WG318> in<WG1722> persecutions,<WG1375> in<WG1722> distresses<WG4730> for Christ's sake:<WG5228> <WG5547> for<WG1063> when<WG3752> I am weak,<WG770> then<WG5119> am<WG1510> I strong.<WG1415>

I am become<WG1096> a fool<WG878> in glorying;<WG2744> ye<WG5210> have compelled<WG315> me:<WG3165> for<WG1063> I<WG1473> ought<WG3784> to have been commended<WG4921> of<WG5259> you:<WG5216> for<WG1063> in nothing<WG3762> am I behind<WG5302> the<WG3588> very chiefest<WG5228> <WG3029> apostles,<WG652> though<WG1499> I be<WG1510> nothing.<WG3762>

Truly <WG3303> the<WG3588> signs<WG4592> of an apostle<WG652> were wrought<WG2716> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> patience,<WG5281> in<WG1722> signs,<WG4592> and<WG2532> wonders,<WG5059> and<WG2532> mighty deeds.<WG1411>

For <WG1063> what<WG5101> is<WG2076> it wherein<WG3739> ye were inferior<WG2274> to<WG5228> other<WG3062> churches,<WG1577> except<WG1508> it be that<WG3754> I<WG1473> myself<WG846> was not burdensome<WG2655> <WG3756> to you?<WG5216> forgive<WG5483> me<WG3427> this<WG5026> wrong.<WG93>

Behold, <WG2400> the third time<WG5154> I am<WG2192> ready<WG2093> to come<WG2064> to<WG4314> you;<WG5209> and<WG2532> I will not<WG3756> be burdensome<WG2655> to you:<WG5216> for<WG1063> I seek<WG2212> not<WG3756> yours,<WG5216> but<WG235> you:<WG5209> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> children<WG5043> ought<WG3784> not<WG3756> to lay up<WG2343> for the<WG3588> parents,<WG1118> but<WG235> the<WG3588> parents<WG1118> for the<WG3588> children.<WG5043>

And <WG1161> I<WG1473> will very gladly<WG2236> spend<WG1159> and<WG2532> be spent<WG1550> for<WG5228> you;<WG5216> though<WG1499> the more abundantly<WG4056> I love<WG25> you,<WG5209> the less<WG2276> I be loved.<WG25>
But <WG1161> be<WG2077> it so, I<WG1473> did not<WG3756> burden<WG2599> you:<WG5209> nevertheless,<WG235> being<WG5225> crafty,<WG3835> I caught<WG2983> you<WG5209> with guile.<WG1388>
Did I<WG1223> <WG846> make a gain<WG4122> of you<WG5209> by<WG3361> any<WG5100> of them whom<WG3739> I sent<WG649> unto<WG4314> you?<WG5209>

I desired<WG3870> Titus,<WG5103> and<WG2532> with him I sent<WG4882> a brother.<WG80> Did<WG3387> Titus<WG5103> make a gain<WG4122> of you?<WG5209> walked<WG4043> we not<WG3756> in the<WG3588> same<WG846> spirit?<WG4151> walked we not<WG3756> in the<WG3588> same<WG846> steps?<WG2487>

Again, <WG3825> think<WG1380> ye that<WG3754> we excuse ourselves<WG626> unto you?<WG5213> we speak<WG2980> before<WG2714> God<WG2316> in<WG1722> Christ:<WG5547> but<WG1161> we do all things,<WG3956> dearly beloved,<WG27> for<WG5228> your<WG5216> edifying.<WG3619>

For <WG1063> I fear,<WG5399> lest<WG3381> when I come,<WG2064> I shall not<WG3756> find<WG2147> you<WG5209> such<WG3634> as I would,<WG2309> and that I<WG2504> shall be found<WG2147> unto you<WG5213> such as<WG3634> ye would<WG2309> not:<WG3756> lest<WG3381> there be debates,<WG2054> envyings,<WG2205> wraths,<WG2372> strifes,<WG2052> backbitings,<WG2636> whisperings,<WG5587> swellings,<WG5450> tumults: <WG181>

And lest,<WG3361> when I come<WG2064> again,<WG3825> my<WG3450> God<WG2316> will humble<WG5013> me<WG3165> among<WG4314> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> that I shall bewail<WG3996> many<WG4183> which have sinned already,<WG4258> and<WG2532> have not<WG3361> repented<WG3340> of<WG1909> the<WG3588> uncleanness<WG167> and<WG2532> fornication<WG4202> and<WG2532> lasciviousness<WG766> which<WG3739> they have committed.<WG4238>
